javadoc: DataComponent provides Data and CodeUnit access to Struct and Array components. NOTE!! DataComponents only have a unique key within its parent Struct/Array. This places a constraint on the use of the key field and getKey() method on the underlying classes CodeUnitDB and DataDB. The CodeUnit key should only be used for managing an object cache.

methods.javadoc:
Get the name of this Data that is a component of another
 Data Item.
@return the name as a component of another prototype,
         and null if this is not a component of another prototype.
methods.name: getFieldName
methods.comment:
Get the name of this Data that is a component of another
 Data Item.

return.comment:
the name as a component of another prototype,
         and null if this is not a component of another prototype.

methods.javadoc: Returns the path name (dot notation) for this field
methods.name: getPathName
methods.comment: Returns the path name (dot notation) for this field

methods.javadoc: @return the relative path name (dot notation) for this field
methods.name: getComponentPathName

return.comment: the relative path name (dot notation) for this field

methods.javadoc: Get the immediate parent Data Prototype of this component
methods.name: getParent
methods.comment: Get the immediate parent Data Prototype of this component

methods.javadoc:
Get the highest level Data Prototype in a hierarchy of structures
 containing this component.
methods.name: getRoot
methods.comment:
Get the highest level Data Prototype in a hierarchy of structures
 containing this component.

methods.javadoc:
Get the offset of this Data item from the start of
  some hierarchy of structures.
methods.name: getRootOffset
methods.comment:
Get the offset of this Data item from the start of
  some hierarchy of structures.

methods.javadoc:
Get the offset of this Data item from the start of its immediate
 parent.
methods.name: getParentOffset
methods.comment:
Get the offset of this Data item from the start of its immediate
 parent.

methods.name: getComponentIndex
methods.comment: Get the index of this Data item within its parent

return.comment:
the index of this component in its parent
         returns -1 if this is not a component

methods.javadoc: Returns whether some other object is "equal to" this one.
methods.name: equals
methods.comment: Returns whether some other object is "equal to" this one.

name: PseudoDataComponent
comment:
DataComponent provides Data and CodeUnit access to Struct and Array components.

 NOTE!! DataComponents only have a unique key within its parent Struct/Array.  This places a constraint on
 the use of the key field and getKey() method on the underlying classes CodeUnitDB and DataDB.
 The CodeUnit key should only be used for managing an object cache.
